author: Reuters Editorial
title: IoIs for KfW Nov 2019 over USD850m, talk unchanged
text:
LONDON, Feb 13 (IFR) -
* IoIs USD850m+. Guidance unchanged from IPTs at MS-5 area. GS is B&D. (7:57am)
* IPTs MS-5 area, USD1bn size, tbp Tuesday. Due 5 Nov 2019, pay 22 Feb, German law, Lux listing, 1k/1k denoms. Long first coupon. (Feb 12)
KfW, guaranteed by Germany and rated Aaa/AAA/AAA (all stable) by Moodyâ€˜s/Scope/S&P, has mandated Deutsche Bank, Goldman Sachs International and Morgan Stanley for a USD1bn SEC registered November 2019 Global transaction. Target market: Retail/Professional/Eligible Counterparties (all distribution channels). Fees: Not applicable. (Feb 12)
